visibilityRule.booleanFilter: (2 AND (5 OR 6 OR 7) ) OR ((1 OR 3) AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6 OR 7))
(2 AND (5 OR 6) ) OR ((1 OR 3) AND ( 4 OR 5 OR 6))
(1 OR 2 OR 3 OR 4) AND 5 AND 6 AND 7
